description.en:
Certified! Textbook for men!!
Hisao Maki uses his own pronouns in the title, and
his ally Isami Ishii gives his life. A shocking work that has been made into a book for the first time!!
★Sutegoro [Bare-handed fight] ���Bare-handed fight ���Meaning of master of bare-handed fighting★

The story is set in the ancient capital of Kamakura---
The main character, Shiro Kazuki, is a member of the vigilante group "Myojin-kai."
People call him a ``fighter'' because he specializes in suppressing violent incidents...
Without regard for life. Katsuki throws herself in search of a place of pandemonium.
The reason is his past that cannot be erased!!

"Sutegoro Senka'', which started serialization in "Weekly Shonen Champion'' in 1973,
is named after Hisao Maki, who was in charge of the original work.
This is a huge picaresque tale of youth.
The illustrator was my ally Isa Mi Ishii, who formed a tag team for the second time since "Nora Inu no Oka''. The delicate and dynamic touch that supported the golden age of "Shonen Champion" caused a chemical reaction with Maki's worldview, and perfectly depicted the protagonist's suffering and frustration. /span>Yes, works depicting the life of a true man are timeless. and touches the souls of readers. ru. This work is based on the theme of "a man's sense of beauty'', which is based on Maki's works such as "Wal'', "Stray Inu no Oka'', and "Tobenai Tsubasa'', which have been released so far. Even after the passing of time, the book presents a unique sense of the world that remains unchanged
